H0.text: With what biblical location would you associate the characters Shem, Ham and Japheth. Ark

H1.text: With what biblical location would you associate the characters Shem, Ham and Japheth. Mount Ararat

H2.text: With what biblical location would you associate the characters Shem, Ham and Japheth. Babylon

H3.text: With what biblical location would you associate the characters Shem, Ham and Japheth. Tevah

A4.text: Hayk, a descendant of Japheth, revolted against Bel (the biblical Nimrod) and returned to the area around Mount Ararat, where he established the roots of the Armenian nation.

A5.text: Noah and his family first settled in Armenia and later moved to Babylon.
